description: External and internal alterations to the house. Removal of glass brick window and replace with tall timber sash in 4-over-4 pattern, Form opening in rear wall of lightwell and insert timber framed double glazed door, Remove existing rooflights, re-cover flat roof, insert new rooflight above family room, Remove timber box stair to roof of main building, Raise flat roof of main building to align with roof slopes to the north and east introducing storage below and insert new roof hatch, Replace single rooflight to northern roof slope with flush conservation rooflight to match existing, Remove wall between small upper ground floor bedroom and rear extension mezzanine, Insert new toilet enclosure to mezzanine with associated plumbing, Replace mezzanine railings with stud wall, Revise lighting within mezzanine area, Remove timber box stair to roof and associated boxing in rear bedroom but retain existing joinery door,  Existing heritage door to be relocated within the lower ground floor, remove spiral stair to mezzanine (Listed Building Consent P2024/3594/LBC also submitted).
